import React from 'react'; const Press = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

PRESS
{/* Main Content Section */}

MEDIA RESOURCES

Welcome to the press section of Riyadh Fashion Week. Here you'll find all the resources you need to cover this prestigious event, including press releases, media kits, and high-resolution images.

PRESS RELEASES

Stay updated with the latest news and announcements from Riyadh Fashion Week. Our press releases provide comprehensive information about upcoming events, designer announcements, and special initiatives.

PRESS RELEASES COMING SOON

MEDIA KIT

Access our comprehensive media kit containing high-resolution images, logos, fact sheets, and other essential resources for media coverage of Riyadh Fashion Week.

{/* Media Contacts Section */}

MEDIA CONTACTS

For press inquiries, interview requests, or media accreditation, please contact our dedicated press team.

Press Office

Email: press@riyadhfashionweek.com
Phone: +966 11 123 4568
WhatsApp: +966 50 123 4567

); }; export default Press;
